name: Ribs
description: Tender, flavorful pork back ribs inspired by Matty Matheson's McRib recipe. Slow-cooked, then finished with BBQ sauce for a sticky glaze.
gist: Coat ribs in mustard and All Purpose Seasoning. Bake covered at 300째F for 2.5 hours, then 30 minutes uncovered at 350째F, slathering BBQ sauce every 10 minutes.
ingredients:
Two racks of pork back ribs
Yellow mustard (enough to lightly coat ribs)
Seasoning blend of choice (e.g., salt, pepper, smoked paprika, garlic powder, onion powder)
Barbecue sauce
steps:
1. Preheat oven to 300째F.
2. Trim silver skin from ribs if necessary.
3. Coat ribs lightly with yellow mustard as a glue for seasoning.
4. Cover ribs generously with seasoning blend.
5. Seal ribs completely in aluminum foil.
6. Bake for 2.5 hours.
7. Remove ribs, increase oven temperature to 350째F.
8. Uncover ribs, baste with fat drippings and slather with BBQ sauce.
9. Cook uncovered for 10 minutes.
10. Repeat basting and cooking two more times, for a total of 30 minutes uncovered and three applications of sauce.
11. Rest ribs uncovered for 5 minutes before serving.
